page.title: 17AT LEISURE
page.content: The majority of the people we asked listed reading,gardening and outdoor sports as their favourite hobbies. Listening to music and watching television were also very popular; indeed we suspect that T.V. has become so much a part of everyday life that some people forget to mention it,taking it for granted instead. Indoor pursuits appear more popular than outdoor ones.Many replies mentioned the Home Computer as an interest and playing "Dungeons and Dragons" was frequently cited by young males.Model making,it appears,is still popular. Football,cricket,fishing,cycling and snooker remain the best loved sports. Going out to see a film has not been killed by the video and the theatre remains popular,if expensive.
